title: Remarks at the Secretary of the Army Farewell Ceremony (US Department of Defense)
text: ( Source : US Department of Defense ) As Delivered by Secretary of Defense Ash Carter , Fort Myer, VA , October 23 , 2015 Look out there at the sunshine, at those magnificent soldiers. They stand for the millions of men and women like them in our
